thread.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens - New Full-Length Trailer
thread.title_full: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens - New Full-Length Trailer

title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens - New Full-Length Trailer
text: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens - New Full-Length Trailer Reported by Jay Cochran - 2015.10.20 The mystery surrounding the new "Star Wars" movie is becoming a little bit clearer as a brand-new full-length trailer for Episode VII: "The Force Awakens" has finally been unveiled. With Lucasfilm and Disney deliberately keeping things close to the vest, "Star Wars" fans have been waiting patiently for an extended preview in the hopes of analyzing each frame of new footage from the surefire blockbuster. Now the wait is officially over. J.J. Abrams' "Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens" is scheduled for release on Decembr 18th and stars Oscar Isaac, Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Adam Driver, Domhnall Gleeson, Max von Sydow, Andy Serkis, Harrison Ford, Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Peter Mayhew, Anthony Daniels, Warwick Davis, Kenny Baker, Lupita Nyong'o, Gwendoline Christie
